game.name: s&box
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠, 전략, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 앱 내 구매, 레벨 에디터 포함, Remote Play Together
game.shortDescription: Our spiritual successor to Garry's Mod, this is a game creation platform built on the Source 2 engine. Play, create, and share games, explore community creations, and experience endless sandbox fun with powerful modern tools.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Our spiritual successor to Garry's Mod, this is a game creation platform built on the Source 2 engine. Play, create, and share games, explore community creations, and experience endless sandbox fun with powerful modern tools.
